name: Kaytee Timothy Biscuits Baked Treat for Pet Guinea Pigs, Rabbits & Other Small Animals, Apple, 4 oz
short_description: Supports dental health through natural chewing activity
Made with sun cured timothy hay and apples
Great enrichment and foraging for small animals
Ideal for playtime and bonding with your pet rabbit, hamster, chinchilla, and other small pets that crave the taste of real sun cured timothy hay, apples, and molasses
The high fiber content of natural timothy grass hay also supports your pet's overall health
product_description: Kaytee Timothy Biscuits Baked with Apples are a healthy and delicious treat that cater to your small animal's natural chewing instincts. These biscuits are packed with the natural high fiber of timothy grass hay, promoting optimal digestion and overall wellbeing. The apple flavor is sure to tantalize your pet's taste buds, providing a flavorful snacking experience they will love. Kaytee Timothy Biscuits Baked with Apples are perfect for placing in a dish or hand feeding, providing a fun and interactive way to bond with your furry friend. However, it's important to remember that treats should only be given in moderation to avoid overfeeding. These treats are ideal for bonding and playtime with your small animal!

name: Oxbow Essentials Guinea Pig Food, Adult Guinea Pig, Made with Oxbow Timothy Hay, Pet Food Pellets with Vitamin C, Small Animal Pet Products, Made in USA, High Fiber, 5 lb. bag
short_description: COMPLETE NUTRITION IN EVERY BITE: Oxbow EVERYBite foods are carefully crafted to provide balanced, complete nutrition in every serving, ensuring your guinea pig gets all the essential nutrients they need for a healthy and happy life

TOP INGREDIENTS FOR DIGESTIVE SUPPORT: Crafted with high-fiber Timothy hay, this premium guinea pig food supports healthy digestion while promoting natural foraging behaviors; It delivers daily enrichment and gut health support in every bite

WHOLE BODY SUPPORT: Packed with stabilized vitamin C and prebiotics to promote healthy digestion, this formula supports your pet’s overall health, including immune function, gut health, and vitality, ensuring a happy and thriving small pet

SMALL PET SAFE: Made with no artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors, this food is crafted with wholesome, high-quality ingredients that deliver the nutrition your pet needs without bad additives; designed to promote healthy eating habits

DAILY FEED: Formulated with 100% of your guinea pig’s daily recommended vitamins and minerals, this balanced diet supports whole-body wellness—including immune strength, healthy development, and steady energy to fuel daily activity and enrichment
product_description: Oxbow Essentials Adult Guinea Pig Food is a premium, veterinarian-recommended diet formulated to meet the specific nutritional needs of adult guinea pigs, featuring high-fiber timothy grass meal as the primary ingredient to support optimal digestive health and prevent obesity. This uniform pellet formula eliminates selective feeding behaviors, ensuring consistent intake of essential nutrients in every bite. Fortified with stabilized vitamin C, prebiotics, and chelated minerals, it promotes immune function, healthy skin, and a vibrant coat. The balanced calcium-to-phosphorus ratio supports bone and urinary health, while the absence of artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors makes it a wholesome choice for daily feeding. Designed for guinea pigs over six months of age, this diet should be fed alongside unlimited access to high-quality grass hay to provide complete and balanced nutrition. Trusted by pet parents and veterinarians alike, Oxbow Essentials Adult Guinea Pig Food supports a healthy, active lifestyle for your adult guinea pig.
product_details: Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.27 x 2.36 x 11.81 inches; 5 Pounds
Manufacturer recommended age ‏ : ‎ 1 month and up

Item Package Dimensions L x W x H 12.09 x 8.03 x 3.98 inches
Item Dimensions LxWxH 8.27 x 2.36 x 11.81 inches

Directions Mature Guinea Pigs (over 6 months) Feed 1/8 cup pellets daily in addition to unlimited grass hay. Although Essentials - Adult Guinea Pig Food is an excellent complete feed for guinea pigs, unlimited access to fresh grass hay should also be provided. Choose from Oxbow’s Western Timothy, Orchard, Oat or Botanical grass hays to provide additional natural fiber. Essentials - Adult Guinea Pig Food is not intended for growing, gestating or lactating animals. Feed Essentials - Young Guinea Pig to guinea pigs requiring a higher level of nutrition. Feed in addition to unlimited grass hay. *This product is not intended for growing, active, pregnant or nursing guinea pigs. We encourage pet owners to feed Oxbow Essentials Young Guinea Pig Food during these stages of life. Please note that these are guidelines. If your guinea pig is overweight or underweight, please contact your veterinarian or Oxbow for more specific feeding information. Transitioning to a New Food: Week 1, mix 3 parts current food with 1 part new food. Week 2, mix 2 parts current food with 2 parts new food. Week 3, mix 1 part current food with 3 parts new food. Week four, feed Essentials - Adult Guinea Pig exclusively.
Model Name Essentials Adult Guinea Pig Food - 5 lb
Age Range Description All Life Stages

Care Instructions Instructions: This product is not intended for growing, active, pregnant or nursing guinea pigs. We encourage pet owners to feed Oxbow Essentials Young Guinea Pig Food during these stages of life. Please note that these are guidelines. If your guinea pig is overweight or underweight, please contact your veterinarian or Oxbow for more specific feeding information.
Specific Uses for Product Digestive Health, Immune Support, Weight Management

name: Kaytee Fiesta Guinea Pig Food, Nutritious and Fun Blend, Supports Dental Health and Digestion, 4.5 pounds
short_description: ENGAGING AND FUN FOR MEALTIME with assorted shapes and textures for enrichment
INGREDIENT RICH BLEND with grains, seeds, fruits, and vegetables for variety
RICH IN NATURAL ANTIOXIDANTS to support overall health and immune function
SUPPORTS DENTAL HEALTH with shapes and textures that encourage chewing
CAREFULLY CRAFTED AND TRUSTED by Kaytee experts for over 150 years
product_description: It’s a party at feeding time with Kaytee Fiesta! Kaytee Fiesta Guinea Pig Food is a fun-filled, complete diet your animal will love, all while getting the nutrition they need to thrive. Filled with an exciting variety of ingredients, shapes and textures, this guinea pig food blend engages your animal at feeding time and stimulates their natural foraging instincts. Kaytee Fiesta Guinea Pig Food was formulated by small animal nutritionists so that your animal is getting necessary nutrition in every bite. This is a nutritionally fortified gourmet diet made of a premium blend of fruits, vegetables, seeds and grains offering maximum variety and stimulation for your guinea pig. The textural variety keeps every bite interesting while supporting their dental health through chewing. While they’re loving their meal, you’ll love watching them work through the party of ingredients, shapes and surprises. This blend provides your pet with natural antioxidants for their overall health and immune support as well as prebiotics and probiotics to help with their digestive health. Sharing your life with a pet is more than just enjoyable, it’s enriching – and Kaytee believes feeding time can be the same. With over 150 years of nutritional experience, it’s no wonder why Kaytee is at the heart of every healthy feeding routine.

name: Kaytee Food from The Wild Natural Pet Guinea Pig Food, 4 Pound
short_description: INSPIRED BY WILD FORAGING HABITS with hand-selected timothy hay, rose hip, carrot, marigold, and strawberry
HIGH FIBER WITH NATURAL PROBIOTICS to support digestive and gut health
NO ADDED SUGAR OR FILLERS crafted for clean nutrition without artificial preservatives
ENCOURAGES CHEWING AND FORAGING, supports natural activity and healthy behavior
CRAFTED BY KAYTEE EXPERTS, trusted small-animal nutrition leader for over 150 years
product_description: Kaytee Food From the wild Guinea Pig Food is inspired by the ancestral grazing habits of guinea pigs in the wild and designed to support your pet’s natural behaviors and nutrition. This thoughtfully crafted diet features hand-selected Kaytee Timothy Hay, rose hip, carrot, marigold, and strawberry to provide a blend of tastes, textures, and fiber comparable to what guinea pigs forage in nature. The pelleted pieces deliver complete nutrition and include natural probiotics to support digestive and gut health. With no added sugar, fillers, or artificial preservatives, this diet focuses on clean and purposeful ingredients. As herbivores, guinea pigs need a diet high in fiber to maintain proper gut bacteria, promote digestive health, and encourage healthy chewing. Let your guinea pig enjoy the variety and enrichment of this forager-style diet while you trust in Kaytee’s over 150 years of small-animal nutrition experience to help them thrive.

This food was developed by an animal nutritional expert to provide small animals a scientifically-backed diet with important nutrition. It contains prebiotics and probiotics to support a healthy gut and digestive health. Superfood ingredients like flax seed that are naturally high in antioxidants help support optimal immune function. The pellets in this blend combat selective eating by making sure all bites are nutritionally equal. The crunchy pieces encourage your animal’s natural chewing behavior to support their dental health. Sharing your life with a pet is more than just enjoyable, it’s enriching – and Kaytee believes feeding time can be the same. name: Wild Harvest Advanced Nutrition Guinea Pig, 4 Pounds, Complete And Balanced Diet
short_description: GUINEA PIG FOOD: Large variety of alfalfa, Timothy hay and vegetables in every bowl to provide the balanced variety of nutrients that pets need, with great taste they’ll love.
ADVANCED NUTRITION: Contains fiber, protein, vitamins and minerals to support a strong body.
IMPORTANT VARIETY: High-fiber pellets and a delicious mix of vegetables creates an irresistible blend to replicate diets found in a natural habitat and encourage foraging behaviors.
DAILY DIET: Feed ¼ cup to ½ cup daily per guinea pig.
WILD HARVEST BRAND: Offers a full assortment of nutritional and interactive engagement products.
product_description: Wild Harvest bird and small animal products offer a full assortment of nutrition and interactive engagement products for your daily bird and small animal needs. We’re committed to providing your birds and small pets with a complete diet containing the vitamins, minerals and nutrients they need for a happy, healthy life. Wild Harvest Advanced Nutrition Diet for Guinea Pigs provides premium nutrition for developing and maintaining good health. Wild Harvest Advanced Nutrition Diet for Guinea Pigs not only offers ideal nutrition for your pet, but also a comprehensive range of ingredients. Varied diets are particularly important for guinea pigs in order to help replicate diets found in their natural habitat and encourage natural foraging behavior. Foraging for food provides guinea pigs with important physical and mental stimulation, and helps keep your pet healthy and happy! Guinea pigs, like humans, are one of the few mammals that cannot produce Vitamin C naturally. Vitamin C is a very important nutrient that helps to maintain overall good health and nutrition. Wild Harvest Advanced Nutrition Diet for Guinea Pigs includes Vitamin C to help ensure that your pet receives this necessary nutrient.
